com.adidas.ui.activities

Class ActionBarDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • ActionBar
      • com.adidas.ui.activities.ActionBarDelegate

  • public class ActionBarDelegate
extends ActionBar
    This class delegates all calls to underlying ActionBar implementation except places when some custom behaviour is needed. For example, to fix some device specific bugs.
    Since:
    1.6.3
